name: XIO
description:
XIO

This is a demo dual button battle game for 2 players, originally designed to support BCI controllers. You can play with keyboard with this web version. 

Control: 

"Q" for Player 1 and "P" for Player 2.

Team:

  • Yuefeng He
  • Jiaqi Shu

Assets Credits:
